allownotificationsText: Se permitires notificações, então serás informado acerca de pagamentos e doações.
toStartAirTime: para começar a usar o AirTime.
pleaseTypePassword: Por favor digite a sua nova palavra-passe.

validateForm.confirmPasswordTooShort: Confirmação da palavra-passe é muito pequena

toLoginNewPassword: para entrares com a tua nova palavra-passe.
somethingWrong: Algo correu errado durante a compra, não cobrámos nada da tua conta, por favor tenta de novo.
ThisProcess60Minutes: Este processo pode demorar até 60 minutos até que os teus TUBEs possam ser gastos.
toResendNewEmail: para reenviar um novo correio electrónico para recuperar a tua palavra-passe
toResendNewActivationEmail: para reenviar um novo correio electrónico de activação.
youReceiveNotifications: You will not receive notifications from us.
toEnableNotifications: To enable notifications please follow this
sorryYouTriedWrongChannel: Sorry you tried to link the wrong channel.

landingPage.title: Join the new way of sharing value on the Internet.
landingPage.text: Monetize your time and receive rewards for your web surfing. Buy goods and services anywhere and donate to publishers you support.
landingPage.footer: The BitTube browser extension is a revolutionary way for monetizing websites and users worldwide, without ads

toVerifyAccountPlaceCodeFacebook: To verify your account please place the code under your Facebook biography.
toVerifyAccountPlaceCodeSoundcloud: To verify your account please place the code under your Soundcloud biography.
onceYouPasteCode: Once you have paste the code in your profile click the 'Verify now' button
toVerifyDomain: To verify your domain download the following txt file and place it inside the public folder of your domain.
onceYouAddedFile: Once you have added the file click the 'Verify now' button
anErrorHasOccured: An error has occured while linking your account. Please try it again later.
theCodeInYourProfile: The code in your profile is invalid or has been not found. Please paste the valid code and try it again.
theCodeUnderDomain: The code under your domain is not correct or doesn't exists. Please place the file under your public folder and try it again.
phoneNumberAlreadyUsed: the phone number has been already used for reward by referral link.
